item.title: Example News
item.description: After copying this file or its content and adjusting the front matter above, everything below this line (and this line aswell) can be deleted and replaced with the content of the news.

item.title: New Workshop: Understanding Venture Capital
item.description: As part of the Erasmus+ Project IMPACT, we are launching a series of talks related to entrepreneurship. Whilst the project is mainly focused on marine robotics and educational transdisciplinary aspects of this field, this specific workshop series is of a more general interest.
